eLITA::

Elita walked and she get lost witout know it, she wndering around a 
large time and finally she arrived to WolfBlades quaters. She 
arrived to the door and this one opened, it seemed that Wolfblade 
hadn't locked it down or programed it to open just when she liked. 
Elita managed to clib up to the bed and cuddle close to wofblade, 
whose warm remembered her to her mommy warm's
